prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Vietnamese. 

Correct speech recognition errors and inconsistencies based on context.

Note that the original timestamps should be PRESERVED for each entry.

PLEASE DON'T CHANGE ORIGINAL TIMESTAMPS.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:01,040",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "12克的Husky"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:02,017",
    "end": "00:00:02,898",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "She is so cute."
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:08,058",
    "end": "00:00:09,038",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "So many dogs."
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:09,318",
    "end": "00:00:10,938",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "We will come back to the dog park."
  }
]

Output JSON format only:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "vi": "Vietnamese text"
  }
]
```

response.vi: Chúng ta sẽ quay lại công viên chó.
